the_kid.why_extracted: Central witness figure - pale, thin, unarmed in violent world
the_kid.reasoning: Perfect witness archetype: present but powerless, observes without acting, distinguished by being unarmed
the_kid.extraction_pattern: Protagonist identified by opening focus and lack of agency markers

judge_holden.why_extracted: Ultimate antagonist - enormous, hairless, destroys through truth
judge_holden.reasoning: Maximum agency - reshapes reality through words alone, commands attention, exposes hidden truths
judge_holden.extraction_pattern: Power figure identified by physical dominance and narrative control

reverend_green.why_extracted: False authority figure exposed as fraud
reverend_green.reasoning: Has temporary power through deception, but fundamentally hollow
reverend_green.extraction_pattern: Authority figure marked by position but undermined by revelation

the_kids_father.why_extracted: Background figure showing degradation through drink
the_kids_father.reasoning: Lost all agency to alcohol, exists only in memory and quoted poetry
the_kids_father.extraction_pattern: Parent figure identified through relationship and degradation state

revival_tent.significance: Arena for truth vs deception confrontation
revival_tent.pattern: Enclosed space where power dynamics play out

dark_woods.significance: Wilderness containing last wolves - dying wildness
dark_woods.pattern: Natural space as refuge for the untamed

judge_reverend_conflict.extraction_cue: Direct confrontation with revelation of crimes

kid_witness_role.extraction_cue: Explicitly noted as unarmed, standing apart

oilcloth_slicker.symbolic_value: Civilization's thin covering over raw power

papers_of_divinity.weight_logic: Authority that doesn't exist carries heaviest weight
papers_of_divinity.symbolic_value: Absent legitimacy that condemns through absence

parsing_patterns_discovered.description: Character who observes but doesn't participate, often unarmed or powerless
Characters gain power by exposing hidden truths
Unusual physical traits indicate supernatural authority

markers: quotes from poets whose names are lost

foreign_keys.pattern: Single UUID string for one-to-one relations

many_to_many.pattern: Array of UUID strings for many-to-many relations

key_learnings: Witnesses are marked by their lack of weapons/power in violent contexts
Physical descriptions often carry metaphorical weight (bald as stone = inhuman)
Icon markers in annotated text provide strong element type hints
Power manifests through ability to reshape social reality with words
Degradation shows in substance abuse and lost knowledge
edge_cases_resolved: Multiple icon markers for same entity - use most specific
Absent objects (papers not possessed) still extractable as elements
Congregation as collective vs individual members
Rain as phenomenon vs mere weather
recommended_improvements: Track speech patterns for character voice
Note temporal markers for event sequencing
Identify symbolic objects vs practical ones
Distinguish witnessed events from participated events
